title: The Philadelphia story
creator_credit: George Cukor, Joseph L Mankiewicz and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: A wealthy society girl, who is about to marry for the second time, finds she still loves her first husband. Cukor’s direction is so discreet you can hardly sense it. Starring Katharine Hepburn, Cary Grant and James Stewart. Based on a play by Philip Barry.
creator_credit_for_label: George Cukor, Joseph L Mankiewicz and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
